ai.summary: A scenic 11.4 km moderate hike around the Cliveden area, offering a mix of woodland paths, grassy trails and gentle hills with views of the surrounding countryside.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows a combination of well-maintained estate paths, short sections of gravel and grassy tracks, plus some gentle inclines. Expect uneven ground in places and occasional steps along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather and wear sturdy walking shoes. Bring water and a map or GPS. Stay on marked paths, respect private property within the Cliveden estate, and be mindful of other visitors. In adverse conditions, sections may be muddy or slippery; take care on wet or uneven surfaces. Let someone know your plans and carry a charged phone.
recommended_gear: Hat and sunscreen for sun protection
Map or GPS device / fully charged phone with offline map
Light rain gear and extra socks
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn (roughly March to October) for the best daylight and trail conditions; winter visits are possible with proper footwear and weather considerations.

seo.title: Cliveden Green Walking Trail - 11.4 km Moderate Hike in Cliveden, UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Cliveden Green Walking Trail: an 11.4 km moderate hike in Cliveden, UK. Enjoy woodland paths, gentle hills, and scenic countryside with practical safety tips and gear.
